pt.ua.dicoogle.server.web.servlets

Class IndexerServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • pt.ua.dicoogle.server.web.servlets.IndexerServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class IndexerServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Provides indexing start and stop requests (scan path). Also handles requests for both indexing progress/status and server path contents.
    Author:
    Ant√≥nio Novo
    See Also:

      • getPathContents

        public static String getPathContents(String path)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a XML document in String form containing the list of child directories of the specified path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the directory to retrieve the child directories of.
        Returns:
        a XML document in String form containing the list of child directories of the specified path.

      • getHTMLServiceAdvancedSettingsForm

        public static String getHTMLServiceAdvancedSettingsForm(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                        String brokerURL,
                                                        String elementID)
                                                 throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Based on the request, returns a String containing a form with all the settings inputs boxes. These boxes are rendered/specified in accordance with the each setting value type reported by the plugin/service.
        Parameters:
        request - the servlet request object.
        brokerURL - the URL of the broker that will apply the settings after receiving this forms post.
        elementID - the ID of this HTML form, can be null.
        Returns:
        a String containing the HTML structure for the form with all the plugin advanced setting.
        Throws:
        IOException
